snippet.title: 4x4 Revolution Trailer
snippet.description:
4x4 Revolution Game modification for 4x4 Evolution 2.

4x4 Revolution is an enhanced modification of the Terminal Reality hit game, 4x4 Evolution and 4x4 Evolution 2. With enhanced compatability between 4x4 Evo 1 and 4x4 Evo 2 tracks 4x4 Revolution combines the best of both realities to bring to you the best offroad racing possible. Whether you are blazing the roads at 100MPH or trudging your way through muddy trails 4x4 Revolution is sure to deliver a renewed excitement for such a great game. From new modern vehicles to multiplier winch abilities 4x4 Revolution will not disappoint.

More information about 4x4 Revolution here:

Forums:
http://evo3beta.forumup.com/

New Download mirror at MediaFire, since site downloads are dead:
http://www.mediafire.com/file/zo4zquoisyub7w0/4x4RevoManSetup.rar
